comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: Hi Miriam199, it is the orchestra and organ of the State Theatre, Sydney in front of the proscenium curtain. Sydney still has this wonderful picture palace, th eexact opposite  of the all the modern cinemas we endure at such high prices!
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection
